page.title: 02SECONDARY EDUCATION
page.content: {Hinchingbrooke School}is a large comprehensive based on two sides of a main road.There are three sections: Lower school-first and second years Middle school-years 3,4 and 5. Upper school-upper and lower sixth The sixth form are based in {Hinchingbrooke House},a historical building owned by prominent families such as the{Cromwells}and the{Earls {of Sandwich,the Montagues.}They participate in many extra activities and sometimes help in Middle and Lower school. Middle school is on the same side of the road as the sixth form, in a fairly modern set of buildings.There are 'blocks' for each subject and extensive sports fields and grounds.
